Master Data Agent is setting up new suppliers in the system, check correctness of changes; perform activation and deactivation suppliers. Additional to Vendor maintenance MDM Agent is responsible for price updates in the system. Support the process of creation/modification/activation/deactivation of suppliers Perform periodic price list update in ERP Cooperating with the Delivery Team…
